subject.normal: [jira] Updated: (WODEN-164) Verify the WSDL and XSD files in the test folder contain the correct licenses

headers.subject: [jira] Updated: (WODEN-164) Verify the WSDL and XSD files in the test folder contain the correct licenses
headers.received: from nike.apache.org (HELO nike.apache.org) (192.87.106.230) by apache.org (qpsmtpd/0.29) with ESMTP; Thu, 10 Feb 2011 20:40:21 +0000

quote.quotepara: Verify the WSDL and XSD files in the test folder contain the correct licenses

Key: WODEN-164 URL: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/WODEN-164 Project: Woden Issue Type: Bug Components: Parser Affects Versions: M7a Reporter: Lawrence Mandel Assignee: Lawrence Mandel Fix For: 1.0

There are a number of WSDL and XSD files in the Woden test folder. Some of these
files look like they're from the W3C WSDL 2.0 test suite. Jeremy added the
Apache license info to these files - I would guess because there was no license
information in them. We either need to remove the files or replace the license
with the correct license. AFAIK I didn't author any of these documents. John and
Graham, please have a look at the list below and state if you authored the
document and if we can remove it. test/ org.apache.woden/ badDescriptionTags.wsdl primer-hotelReservationService.wsdl org.apache.woden.resolver.resources/ binding.wsdl interface.wsdl schemaImport.xsd schemaInclude.xsd woden14.wsdl org.apache.woden.wsdl20.extensions.http.resources/ HTTPBindingExtensions.wsdl HTTPBindingFaultExtensions.wsdl HTTPBindingMessageReferenceExtensions.wsdl HTTPBindingOperationExtensions.wsdl HTTPEndpointExtensions.wsdl org.apache.woden.wsdl20.extensions.soap.resources/ SOAPBindingExtensions.wsdl SOAPBindingFaultExtensions.wsdl SOAPBindingFaultReferenceExtensions.wsdl SOAPBindingMessageReferenceExtensions.wsdl SOAPBindingOperationExtensions.wsdl org.apache.woden.wsdl20.xml.resources/ EndpointElementTest.wsdl ServiceElementTest.wsdl
